summary: This document appears to be a series of email exchanges primarily between Cassandra Sorrentino and an unnamed recipient regarding the signing of a document titled 'Epstein & FTCA Retainer' or similar. The emails discuss technical issues with signing and include a brief unrelated thank-you note from Jennifer Freeman regarding an 'FBI Lawsuit'.

persons.name: Cassandra Sorrentino
persons.context: Appears as the sender/requester in multiple emails, asking an unnamed recipient to review and sign a document related to 'Epstein & FTCA Retainer'.

persons.name: Jennifer Freeman
persons.context: Sends a thank-you note in an email with the subject 'Re: FBI Lawsuit', unrelated to the main signature request thread.

events.title: Signature Request for Epstein & FTCA Document
events.description: Cassandra Sorrentino sends a request via Adobe for an unnamed recipient to review and sign a document titled 'Epstein & FTCA Retainer'.

keyFacts: A document titled 'Epstein & FTCA Retainer' or similar is the subject of a signature request in March 2024.
The correspondence indicates ongoing administrative or legal activity related to Epstein and the Federal Tort Claims Act (FTCA) as of early 2024.
A separate, brief email thread references an 'FBI Lawsuit' and involves Jennifer Freeman.
